Civ4GameText.TEXT:
TXT_KEY_BUILD_DEFORESTATION Deforestation
<<<<<<< HEAD 砍伐丛林 ======= Deforestation >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TXT_KEY_BUTTON_SACRIFICE [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sacrifice[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPY] for %d1 turns.[NEWLINE]This order sacrifice the slave, leading to extra happiness and celebrations in the city for %d2 turns. This will consume the slave.
<<<<<<< HEAD [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牺牲[COLOR_REVERT]%d1回合[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPY]。[NEWLINE]通过牺牲奴隶，,为城市提供长达%d2回合额外的快乐点数和庆典回合（我们热爱领袖日），并且消耗此奴隶。 ======= [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sacrifice[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPY] for %d1 turns.[NEWLINE]This order sacrifice the slave, leading to extra happiness and celebrations in the city for %d2 turns. This will consume the slave. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: The Great Person will make another civilization forget your past transgressions and improve your relations. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.Chinese: The Great Person will make another civilization forget your past transgressions and improve your relations. It consumes the Great Person.

TEXT.English: The Great Person will broker an immediate peace treaty between you and your enemy. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.Chinese: The Great Person will broker an immediate peace treaty between you and your enemy. It consumes the Great Person.

TEXT.English: Attempts to remove one non-State religion from the city. This will consume the Prosecutor.
TEXT.Chinese: Attempts to remove one non-State religion from the city. This will consume the Prosecutor.

TEXT.English: This will order the Great Person to reform your government, allowing you to change civics this turn without any anarchy. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.Chinese: This will order the Great Person to reform your government, allowing you to change civics this turn without any anarchy. It consumes the Great Person.

TEXT.English: This will order the Great Person to end the anarchy in your civilization and the unrest in all your cities. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.Chinese: This will order the Great Person to end the anarchy in your civilization and the unrest in all your cities. It consumes the Great Person.

TEXT.English: The Great Person will spread your state religion in several surrounding cities, potentially causing other religions to leave. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.Chinese: The Great Person will spread your state religion in several surrounding cities, potentially causing other religions to leave. It consumes the Great Person.

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
TXT_KEY_MISSION_START_GOLDENAGE_HELP This order will consume one or more Great People (of different types) and initiate a Golden Age (extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
<<<<<<< HEAD 这项命令将消耗掉一个或多个（不同类型的）伟人并开启黄金时代（额外增加[ICON_PRODUCTION]、[ICON_COMMERCE]与[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]）。 ======= This order will consume one or more Great People (of different types) and initiate a Golden Age (extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]). >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: Lets you see more details about a rival civilization's espionage against you in the Espionage Advisor.
TEXT.Chinese: Lets you see more details about a rival civilization's espionage against you in the Espionage Advisor.
